text: Nuko dusezeranya Musa amajoro mirongo itatu (yo kwiherera asenga no kumuhishurira Tawurati) tuyongeraho andi icumi, maze isezerano rya Nyagasani we ryuzura mu majoro mirongo ine. Musa abwira umuvandimwe we Haruna ati “Nsigarira ku bantu banjye, unakore ibitunganye (ubakangurira kubaha Imana no kuyisenga yonyine) kandi ntuzakurikire inzira y’abangizi.”
